snippet: The Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals in New Orleans on Wednesday told judges in Louisiana, Mississippi and Texas to wrap up same-sex marriage cases in their states in line with last week’s United States Supreme Court ruling.
abstract: Appeals court in New Orleans tells judges in Louisiana, Texas and Mississippi to wrap up pending cases over same-sex marriage in accordance with Supreme Court ruling in favor of gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: The Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals in New Orleans on Wednesday told judges in Louisiana, Mississippi and Texas to wrap up same-sex marriage cases in their states in line with last week’s United States Supreme Court ruling.

headline.main: Federal Judges’ Rulings Clear Hurdles to Same-Sex Marriages
headline.print_headline: Federal Judges’ Rulings Clear Hurdles to Same-Sex Marriages

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
